title: General Inquiries | Language and Culture Learning Center | University of Illinois at Chicago
contents: Skip to the content of this page ,  the main menu , the secondary menu , the site search form , the site home page .           Language and Culture Learning Center     Search the site     Toggle Menu      Search                  Language and Culture Learning Center      Language and Culture Learning Center   Main Menu    About           What We Do    Who We Are    Affiliate Language Centers         Peer Tutoring           What is Peer Tutoring?    Meet Our Tutors    Tutoring Schedule (ONLINE as of 3/16)    For Students (Tips and Resources)    Become a Tutor    Peer Tutoring Blog    Tutoring FAQ    Contact Peer Tutoring         Events           Schedule of Events    Conversation Hours    Film Series    Special Events         Language StorieS    For Instructors           Professional Development    Instructor Resources    COVID-19 Resources         Contact           General Inquiries    Equipment Reservation    Oasis Reservation          Eyebrow menu    lcsl.uic.edu    las.uic.edu    +Give    UIC menu    UIC.edu    Campus Map       Search               View Menu           Breadcrumbs   Language and Culture Learning Center    Contact    General Inquiries        General Inquiries  If you have any questions to LCLC please fill out the contact form below or email us directly.  This is a general inquiry contact form. If you are looking to reserve the Language Oasis (GH 308) or to rent equipment, click on the links on the left.  You can also send us an email .      General Inquiries   Name    First     Last   Role (Faculty, TA, GA, etc.) * Required Department/ Program * Required E-Mail * Required I want to: * Required Select from the options below (as many as needed) to narrow your request.   Reserve the Language Oasis    Reserve equipment    Request fresh popcorn for your event    Cancel an event    Request digital services (e.g. uploading a movie)    Request help with technology (Blackbaord, VoiceThread, etc.)    Request help with a digital project    Other (specify below)  For Oasis reservation please click the following link - enter a valid website URL for example https://www.google.com   Details and other comments * Required If you selected "Other" above, please tell us about your request. With any other option, describe your request in more detail. The more you can tell us the better and faster we will be able to address your request. Comments This field is for validation purposes and should be left unchanged.    Save and Continue Later             This iframe contains the logic required to handle Ajax powered Gravity Forms.          Contact           General Inquiries    Equipment Reservation    Oasis Reservation             Peer Tutoring Contact Information  Click here if you have questions about our Peer Tutoring in French, German, Spanish, or Italian.      Reserve the Language Oasis  If you would like to schedule a special event in our Language Oasis please click here and let us know how we can help.      Equipment Reservation  The LCLC has a wide variety of equipment for language instructors and TAs. Click here to reserve equipment for your classroom or event.      School of Literatures, Cultural Studies and Linguistics  The School of Literatures, Cultural Studies and Linguistics (LCSL) is home to six independent departments, three academic programs, and the Sandi Port Errant Language and Culture Learning Center.
